bibl.title: Archilochus the "Anti Hero"? Heroism, Flight and Values in Homer and the New Archilochus Fragment (P.Oxy LXIX 4708).
bibl.note: 1. Archilochus and Homer. - 2. Flight and heroism in the new Archilochus [P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708 (= M.-P.3 122; LDAB 327)]. - 3. Flight and heroism in the Iliad and in Archilochus. - 4. Breaking with Homer: Archilochus the anti-hero. - 5. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: L.A. Swift, Archilochus the "Anti Hero"? Heroism, Flight and Values in Homer and the New Archilochus Fragment (P.Oxy LXIX 4708).

1. Archilochus and Homer. - 2. Flight and heroism in the new Archilochus [P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708 (= M.-P.3 122; LDAB 327)]. - 3. Flight and heroism in the Iliad and in Archilochus. - 4. Breaking with Homer: Archilochus the anti-hero. - 5. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
